name: Seasons (Gsquadron)
description:
Seasons is a game to get cubes on each level. There are 10 fully playable levels and the last level is quite different from the one you started playing.

The game builds up being better and better by each level, but bear in mind that it is also a difficult game because there are cubes hiding all over the place!

By buying my game, you truly support my game development career and I have put all passion into making this game, so thank you!

Enjoy!
